page.title: 17THE COLLEGE (CLOWNE)
page.content: THE PROPER TITLE OF THE COLLEGE IS THE NORTH EAST DERBYSHIRE COLLEGE OF FURTHER EDUCATION. IT OPENED IN 1931 AS CLOWNE MINING AND TECHNICAL INSTITUTE WITH ONLY 4 CLASSROOMS.IN THE LAST 30 YEARS IT HAS GROWN TREMENDOUSLY TO INCLUDE A SPORTS HALL,DINING FACILITIES,WORKSHOPS AND LABORATORIES AND A LIBRARY WHICH IS ALSO THE PUBLIC LIBRARY.IT HAS EXPANDED TO INCLUDE THE BUILDINGS OF THE OLD JUNIOR AND INFANT SCHOOLS. IN THE PRESENT ACADEMIC YEAR THERE WERE 550 FULL TIME STUDENTS UNDERTAKING COURSES AS VARIED AS MOTOR VEHICLE ENGINEERING,COMMUNITY CARE, NURSERY NURSING,HAIRDRESSING,AND COMPUTER STUDIES.THERE ARE ALSO OVER 3000 PART-TIME STUDENTS INCLUDING THOSE ATTENDING EVENING CLASSES,AND 15 AND 16 YEAR OLD PUPILS FROM NEARBY SCHOOLS.
